name: Saving Home
description:
DESCRIPTION

A post Global Game Jam 2019 entry (with fixes).

In a hostile world we find a new home, finding a house, making it warm and moving your family there.  

Original Release: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/saving-home

CREDITS

PROGRAMMING

Daniel Streitenberger
2D ART

3D ART

MUSIC & SFX

GAME DESIGN
